name: Casi's Adventure
description:
Controls:

  • [A] & [D]  -> Walk left and right
  • [Z] Jump & interact

Casi's Adventure  is cute plattformer, where you collect  hot dog ingredients for your hot dog selling friend who got robbed. 

Right now I only have made a tiny demo. I worked on the game for like a month or two, during my free time while I am a full-time student.

I would appreaciate if you try it and leave me some feedback, especially because this is my first ever game. So my knowledge is a bit limited. The game was created in GB-Studio.

Have fun (:

(Please do not use the downloaded files for something else except playing the game)
